summary: THE SMELL WHILE USING THE HEATER OR THE AIR CONDITIONER IS SO HORRIBLE IT'S ALMOST A HEALTH HAZARD TO USE IT.  THE HEATER IS SO HOT IT DRIED OUT OUR EYES AND NOSES WITH EVEN A SHORT TRIP IN THE CAR.  THE AIR CONDITIONING WORKED GREAT AND FELT WONDERFUL BUT THE SMELL WAS UNBEARABLE.   LINCOLN MERCURY IN DEARBORN, MI COULD NOT FIND ANYTHING AND SAID THEY DIDN'T SMELL ANYTHING EITHER.   IT SMELLS OF URINE AND AN OLD WET RAG COMBO.      *TT
